message.content:
1. A trial was conducted between July 2007 and February 2009.
2. The trial was open-label.
3. The trial was randomized.
4. The trial was controlled.
5. The trial involved chloroquine and dihydroartemisinin-piperaquine.
6. The trial included patients aged three months and over.
7. The patients in the trial had slide-confirmed P. vivax mono-infections.

messages.content:
Statement: Between July 2007 and February 2009, an open-label, randomized controlled trial of chloroquine and dihydroartemisinin-piperaquine in patients aged three months and over with slide-confirmed P. vivax mono-infections was conducted.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
